column2: while you wait...the decor is interesting
column3: the ceiling (skylight) gorgeous and the beverages were flowing in timely fashion. Also
column4: there's an adjoining "bread to go" area with also some "goat" souvenirs
column5: fresh flowers and maple syrup and so forth where you can burn some time. (Just FYI too - it's a coffee/espresso as well as full bar!) HOL! (link to this in case you're wondering:
